mentions.context: The Kaldi-based Automatic Transcription System (KATS) uses context dependent DNN-HMM phone models.
Using the SRILM toolkit [15], a pruned trigram language model is estimated on the le Monde + Gigaword corpus and used to produce the word lattice.
The Kaldi-based Automatic Transcription System (KATS) uses context dependent DNN-HMM phone models.
